page.title: 01AREA DESCRIPTION
page.content:
LANDSCAPE Block 0300693 lies just north of the village Saline which is northwest of Dunfermline.The landscape of this area is gently undulating ranging in height from 109 metres in the west to 359 metres on Saline hill in the southeast.The area is drained by several small burns.
FARMING The main economy of the area is based on sheep and cattle rearing with a little arable agriculture of fodder crops such as silage, hay and rape with some barley as a cash crop.
POPULATION Population is sparse and mainly dispersed in individual farmhouses.
